original_text: And he looked, and, behold, there was a cake baken on the coals, and a cruse of water at his head. And he did eat and drink, and laid him down again.
korean_text: 본즉 머리맡에 숯불에 구운 떡과 한 병 물이 있더라 이에 먹고 마시고 다시 누웠더니

sentences.original_text: there was a cake baken on the coals
and a cruse of water at his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 머리맡에 물 한 그릇이 있었다

sentences.original_text: And he did eat and drink
